# Inline HTML (Span-level)

## Basic Inline Tags

This has <strong>strong</strong> text inline.

This has <em>emphasized</em> text inline.

This has <b>bold</b> and <i>italic</i> together.

## Links with HTML

Click <a href="http://example.com">this link</a> to visit.

Or try <a href="http://example.org" title="Example">this one with title</a>.

## Code Tags

Use the <code>printf()</code> function for output.

The <code>&lt;div&gt;</code> element is a container.

## Abbreviations and Definitions

<abbr title="HyperText Markup Language">HTML</abbr> is the standard.

The <dfn>API</dfn> defines the interface.

## Subscript and Superscript

Water is H<sub>2</sub>O.

E = mc<sup>2</sup>.

## Marked and Deleted

This is <mark>highlighted</mark> text.

This is <del>deleted</del> and <ins>inserted</ins>.

## Keyboard and Sample

Press <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>C</kbd> to copy.

The output was: <samp>Hello, World!</samp>

## Mixed Markdown and HTML

This is _markdown italic_ and <em>HTML italic</em> in one line.

This is **markdown bold** and <strong>HTML bold</strong> together.

## Span with Class

This has <span class="highlight">highlighted span</span> text.

## Break Tags

Line one.<br>Line two.<br>Line three.

## Image Tags

<img src="image.png" alt="Alt text" title="Image title">
